|  [lineWidth](./harp-text-canvas.textlayoutstyle.linewidth.md) |  | number | Maximum line width (pixels). |
|  [maxLines](./harp-text-canvas.textlayoutstyle.maxlines.md) |  | number | Maximum number of lines to be considered when using \[\[TextCanvas\]\]. |

|  [placements](./harp-text-canvas.textlayoutstyle.placements.md) |  | [TextPlacements](./harp-text-canvas.textplacements.md) | Text placement options relative to label anchor (origin). \[\[TextPlacement\]\]s options may override alignment settings. |
|  [tracking](./harp-text-canvas.textlayoutstyle.tracking.md) |  | number | Inter-glyph spacing (pixels). Scaled by \[\[FontSize\]\]. |
|  [verticalAlignment](./harp-text-canvas.textlayoutstyle.verticalalignment.md) |  | [VerticalAlignment](./harp-text-canvas.verticalalignment.md) | Text position regarding the baseline. |
